Detailed Description

Provides a input events.

This class provide an event like QEvent ( but it's not a QEvent child) which contain all information of an input status

Author:
sacha schutz <istdasklar@gmail.com>

Member Function Documentation

unsigned short KCLInputEvent::code (  )  [inline]

For example the code of Mouse button left is : LeftBtn. Look on this page to see the code list.

Returns:
the code of the input status.

struct input_event KCLInputEvent::inputEvent (  )  [inline, read]

convert KCLInputEvent into a standard C input_event

Returns:
an input_event

unsigned long KCLInputEvent::tvSec (  )  [inline]

unsigned short KCLInputEvent::type (  )  [inline]

For example, if you press a button, it will return EV_KEY. If you move your mouse, it will return EV_REL. If you move your joystick it will return EV_ABS. Please look in evdev type for more information

Returns:
the type of the input status .

unsigned int KCLInputEvent::value (  )  [inline]

For example the value after press a button is 1. If you move an axis, the value will return the axis value.

Returns:
the value of the input status.
